00403 __STATIC_INLINE void DMA_ResetLoop(unsigned int channel)
00404 {
00405   /* Clean loop copy operation */
00406   switch(channel)
00407   {
00408     case 0:
00409       DMA->LOOP0 = _DMA_LOOP0_RESETVALUE;
00410       break;
00411     case 1:
00412       DMA->LOOP1 = _DMA_LOOP1_RESETVALUE;
00413       break;
00414     default:
00415       break;
00416   }
00417 }
00418 #endif

00429 __STATIC_INLINE void DMA_ResetRect(unsigned int channel)
00430 {
00431   (void) channel;
00432 
00433   /* Clear rect copy operation */
00434   DMA->RECT0 = _DMA_RECT0_RESETVALUE;
00435 }
00436 #endif
